___traits_trait_additional_properties_js.description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
___traits_trait_additional_properties_js.title: Has additional properties

___traits_trait_alignment_json.description: A property used to determine horizontal positioning of a content element relative to the elements that immediately follow it in the element sequence.
___traits_trait_alignment_json.title: Alignment

___traits_trait_block_properties_json.description: Block properties for style formatting content elements

dropcap.description: Style the first letter of the first word with a dropcap
dropcap.title: Dropcap

___traits_trait_block_properties_json.title: Block properties

___traits_trait_channel_json.description: An optional list of output types for which this element should be visible
___traits_trait_channel_json.title: Channel trait

___traits_trait_content_elements_json.description: Holds attributes of an ANS collection - a common parent to story and gallery objects.
___traits_trait_content_elements_json.title: A collection of content.

___traits_trait_focal_point_json.description: Coordinates representing the 'visual center' of an image. The X axis is horizontal line and the Y axis the vertical line, with 0,0 being the LEFT, TOP of the image.

x.description: The coordinate point on the horizontal axis

y.description: The coordinate point on the vertical axis

___traits_trait_focal_point_json.title: Focal Point

___traits_trait_gallery_properties_json.description: An object for overrides for images when images are used in a gallery. Example usage: Each image in a gallery may have the images own focal point overridden by the gallery.
___traits_trait_gallery_properties_json.title: Has gallery properties

___traits_trait_id_json.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.
___traits_trait_id_json.title: Globally Unique ID trait

___traits_trait_subtype_json.description: A user-defined categorization method to supplement type. In Arc, this field is reserved for organization-defined purposes, such as selecting the PageBuilder template that should be used to render a document.
___traits_trait_subtype_json.title: Subtype or Template

___utils_content_element_json.description: An item that conforms to this schema can be rendered in a sequence
___utils_content_element_json.title: An element that can be listed as part of content elements

description: A blockquote content element, incompatible with the original blockquote: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/washingtonpost/ans-schema/master/src/main/resources/schema/ans/0.10.9/story_elements/blockquote.json
